column1: Art Institute of Chicago////All that being said - this museum is ridiculously expensive and out of reach for too many. One free day a week is hardly enough. You're even charged to check your coat! This sets the stage for (again
column2: IMHO) an elitist space that has so much to offer but can't be offered to too many. Even in these tough economic times
column3: there is simply no excuse for this.
